headline.main: Washington Is Surprised; PANAMA FORBIDS ARMING OF SHIPS

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Oct. 6 -- Panama's decision to forbid arming of foreign-owned ships caused surprise in unofficial quarters here today. There was no official comment beyond word that the State Department had no information of such a decision.
abstract: On Panama bar to arming of merchant ships
